text: Approval for the ACS Multi-Link RX Duet(TM) and ACS Multi-Link OTW Duet(TM) Coronary Stent Systems.  These devices are indicated for improving coronary luminal diameter in patients with symptomatic ischemic heart disease due to discrete de novo and restenotic lesions in native coronary arteries (length < 25mm) with a reference vessel diameter ranging from 3.0 mm to 4.0 mm.
